storage.name: 1TB Samsung 990 PRO
storage.description: The Samsung 990 PRO 1TB represents the pinnacle of M.2 NVMe storage technology, delivering exceptional performance for the most demanding users. With industry-leading sequential read speeds up to 7,450 MB/s and write speeds up to 6,900 MB/s, along with phenomenal random read/write performance reaching 1.2/1.55 million IOPS, this drive delivers unmatched responsiveness for professionals and enthusiasts alike. The 990 PRO features Samsung's proprietary V-NAND technology and controller, optimized for gaming, content creation, and intensive workloads, while the intelligent thermal control and nickel-coated controller prevent performance throttling under sustained loads. With a 600 TBW endurance rating and 5-year warranty, it offers reliability that matches its elite performance profile.

storage.name: 1TB Crucial T500
storage.description: The Crucial T500 1TB SSD represents the pinnacle of Gen4 NVMe storage, delivering extraordinary performance for demanding users. With lightning-fast read speeds up to 7,300 MB/s and write speeds up to 6,800 MB/s, it provides elite-level responsiveness for intensive workloads like content creation, 3D rendering, and competitive gaming. The exceptional 600 TB write endurance ensures superior longevity, while the premium hardware design incorporates advanced thermal management to maintain peak performance under sustained loads. Backed by a comprehensive 5-year warranty and Crucial's Storage Executive software, this drive offers a perfect blend of capacity, performance, and reliability.

storage.name: 1TB Crucial P310
storage.description: The Crucial P310 1TB SSD delivers exceptional performance with PCIe Gen4 x4 NVMe technology in a sleek M.2 form factor. Featuring blazing-fast sequential read speeds up to 7,100 MB/s and write speeds up to 6,000 MB/s, this drive dramatically reduces load times and accelerates data-intensive tasks. With 1TB of storage capacity and a solid 220 TBW endurance rating, it provides ample space and reliability for gaming libraries, creative projects, and everyday computing. The sleek black design with Crucial branding complements any build while the 5-year warranty ensures long-term peace of mind.

storage.name: 500GB Kingston NV3
storage.description: The Kingston NV3 500GB SSD delivers high-speed PCIe Gen4 NVMe performance in a compact M.2 form factor. With read speeds up to 6,000 MB/s and write speeds up to 2,200 MB/s, this drive accelerates boot times, application loading, and file transfers. The 3D NAND technology ensures reliability with a 160 TBW endurance rating and 2,000,000 hours MTBF. Perfect for gamers, content creators, and everyday users who want to enhance system responsiveness and multitasking capabilities while keeping temperatures and power consumption low.

power_supply.name: 850W Our Choice 80 Plus Gold
power_supply.description: The 850W Our Choice 80 Plus Gold power supply delivers excellent performance for premium gaming setups and professional workstations. With 850 watts of clean, reliable power and up to 90% efficiency thanks to 80 Plus Gold certification, it provides plenty of headroom for high-end components while reducing energy costs and heat output. This fully-modular design allows for complete cable customization, dramatically improving airflow and aesthetics with the ability to use only the cables your system requires. The premium 135mm fluid dynamic bearing fan offers near-silent operation even under heavy loads, while high-quality 100% Japanese capacitors and comprehensive protections ensure long-term stability and reliability.
features: Compatible with Intel and AMD platforms

power_supply.name: 1000W Our Choice 80 Plus Gold
power_supply.description: The 1000W Our Choice 80 Plus Gold power supply delivers exceptional power and efficiency for high-end gaming rigs and professional workstations. With 1000 watts of continuous power and 80 Plus Gold certification, it provides abundant clean power for multi-GPU setups and overclocked systems with up to 90% energy efficiency. This semi-modular PSU features premium components, including 100% Japanese capacitors rated at 105°C, and a fluid dynamic bearing fan for silent cooling even under heavy loads. With comprehensive safety protections and flexible modular cabling, it's the perfect choice for enthusiasts and professionals who demand reliable power for the most demanding hardware configurations.
features: Compatible with Intel and AMD platforms

power_supply.name: 750W Our Choice 80 Plus Gold
power_supply.description: The 750W Our Choice 80 Plus Gold power supply delivers premium efficiency and reliability for high-performance gaming rigs and workstations. With 80 Plus Gold certification, it provides excellent energy efficiency up to 90%, reducing heat output and electricity costs. This power supply features a semi-modular design, allowing you to connect only the cables you need for a cleaner build with improved airflow. The 120mm fluid dynamic bearing fan offers whisper-quiet operation, while high-quality Japanese capacitors ensure long-term stability and durability. Perfect for enthusiasts who demand reliable power with premium efficiency.
features: Compatible with Intel and AMD platforms

power_supply.name: 750W Our Choice 80 Plus Bronze
power_supply.description: The 750W Our Choice 80 Plus Bronze power supply delivers reliable power for high-performance gaming systems and demanding workstations. With 80 Plus Bronze certification, it provides good efficiency to reduce energy costs while the 120mm fan ensures quiet operation even under heavy loads. This non-modular power supply comes with ample connectors for high-end graphics cards and peripherals, including multiple PCIe, SATA, and CPU power connectors. It's the perfect affordable solution for gamers and content creators who need additional headroom for power-hungry components.
features: Compatible with Intel and AMD platforms

power_supply.name: 650W Our Choice 80 Plus Bronze
power_supply.description: The 650W Our Choice 80 Plus Bronze power supply delivers reliable power for mid-range gaming systems and workstations. With 80 Plus Bronze certification, it offers good efficiency to help reduce electricity costs and heat output. This non-modular power supply features all essential connectors for modern systems including PCIe, SATA, and CPU power. The 120mm fan ensures quiet operation while providing adequate cooling. Perfect for budget-conscious builders who don't want to compromise on quality and reliability.
features: Compatible with Intel and AMD platforms

ram.name: 128GB Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR5
ram.description: 128GB (4x32GB) Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR5 memory represents the absolute pinnacle of high-performance memory with no compromises. This massive quad-channel kit delivers both extreme capacity and stunning RGB lighting effects that can be synchronized with your motherboard's RGB control software. With 5600 MT/s speed and optimized timings, this flagship memory solution delivers unmatched bandwidth for professional 3D rendering, scientific computing, and complex virtualization environments, while creating a spectacular visual centerpiece in any high-end workstation build.

ram.name: 128GB Kingston FURY Beast DDR5
ram.description: 128GB (4x32GB) Kingston FURY Beast DDR5 memory delivers unprecedented capacity for extreme high-end workstation applications. This massive quad-channel kit combines cutting-edge DDR5 technology with 5600 MT/s speed to deliver exceptional bandwidth and responsiveness for data-intensive tasks like 3D rendering, scientific computing, and professional virtualization. The low-profile heat spreader design ensures efficient cooling even under the most demanding workloads, making it the definitive solution for professional workstations and high-end content creation systems.

ram.name: 64GB G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo RGB White
ram.description: 64GB (2x32GB) G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo RGB in an exclusive white design represents the absolute pinnacle of premium high-capacity memory. This flagship kit combines massive capacity with 6000 MT/s speed and optimized low-latency timings to deliver unrivaled bandwidth for the most demanding professional workloads. The distinctive white heatspreader with brilliant RGB lighting effects creates a stunning focal point in showcase builds. The ultimate luxury memory solution for professional content creators and extreme enthusiasts.

ram.name: 64GB Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR5
ram.description: 64GB (2x32GB) Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR5 memory represents the ultimate combination of extreme capacity, performance, and aesthetic appeal. With 6000MHz speed and dynamic RGB lighting effects that can be synchronized with your motherboard's RGB software, this flagship memory kit delivers unmatched bandwidth for professional workloads while creating a stunning visual showcase. The perfect statement piece for high-end workstations and enthusiast builds demanding both maximum memory capacity and premium aesthetics.

ram.name: 64GB Kingston FURY Beast DDR5
ram.description: 64GB (2x32GB) Kingston FURY Beast DDR5 memory is the ultimate solution for extreme multitasking, professional content creation, and high-end gaming. This massive capacity kit features 5600MHz speed and advanced DDR5 architecture to deliver exceptional bandwidth and responsiveness. The low-profile heat spreader ensures efficient cooling even under heavy workloads, making it perfect for workstations and enthusiast systems using the latest DDR5-compatible platforms.

ram.name: 32GB G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo RGB White
ram.description: 32GB (2x16GB) G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo RGB in a striking white design represents the absolute pinnacle of premium memory. With 6000 MT/s speed and optimized latency timings, this elite kit delivers exceptional bandwidth for the most demanding applications and games. The stunning white heatspreader with RGB lighting effects makes it a standout aesthetic centerpiece for high-end builds. Perfect for showcase systems using the latest AMD or Intel platforms.

ram.name: 32GB G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo RGB
ram.description: 32GB (2x16GB) G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo RGB DDR5 memory represents the pinnacle of RAM technology, combining unmatched performance with striking aesthetics. With 6000 MT/s speed and optimized latency timings, this premium kit delivers exceptional bandwidth for the most demanding applications and games. The distinctive RGB lighting design with customizable effects makes it the centerpiece of any high-end build using the latest AMD or Intel platforms.

ram.name: 32GB Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR5
ram.description: 32GB (2x16GB) Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR5 memory delivers the ultimate combination of stunning RGB effects and cutting-edge DDR5 performance. With blazing-fast 6000MT/s speed and RGB lighting that can be customized via motherboard RGB control software, this premium memory kit is designed for enthusiasts who want both maximum performance and visual impact. Perfect for high-end gaming rigs and workstations using the latest Intel and AMD platforms.

ram.name: 32GB Kingston FURY Beast DDR5
ram.description: 32GB (2x16GB) Kingston FURY Beast DDR5 memory represents a major leap in desktop memory technology. With blazing-fast 5600MHz speed and CL36 latency, this high-performance memory kit delivers exceptional bandwidth and lower power consumption compared to DDR4. The stylish low-profile heat spreader enhances both cooling and aesthetics. Perfect for enthusiasts using next-generation Intel and AMD platforms that support DDR5 technology.

ram.name: 32GB Kingston FURY Beast RGB
ram.description: 32GB (2x16GB) Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR4 memory delivers both high capacity and stunning RGB lighting effects. The vibrant RGB light bar can be customized and synchronized with popular motherboard RGB control software, while the high-performance 3200MHz speed with CL16 latency ensures excellent gaming and multitasking performance. Ideal for RGB enthusiasts who need both style and substantial memory capacity for demanding workloads.

ram.name: 32GB Kingston FURY Beast
ram.description: 32GB (2x16GB) Kingston FURY Beast DDR4 memory delivers impressive performance with speeds up to 3200MHz and CL16 latency. This high-capacity kit is perfect for demanding workloads, content creation, and multitasking. The stylish black heat spreader provides efficient thermal dissipation while maintaining a sleek aesthetic, and with XMP profiles for easy overclocking, it's an ideal choice for gamers and power users who need ample memory.

ram.name: 16GB Kingston FURY Beast RGB
ram.description: 16GB (2x8GB) Kingston FURY Beast RGB DDR4 memory combines stunning RGB lighting with high-performance 3200MHz speed. The customizable RGB light bar delivers smooth, dynamic lighting effects that can be synchronized with popular motherboard RGB control software. With CL16 latency and XMP profiles, it delivers both style and substance for gaming PCs and RGB-focused builds.

ram.name: 16GB Kingston FURY Beast
ram.description: 16GB (2x8GB) Kingston FURY Beast DDR4 memory delivers impressive performance with speeds up to 3200MHz and CL16 latency. The sleek black heat spreader design adds style to your build while providing efficient cooling for consistent performance. With XMP support for easy overclocking, this kit is perfect for gamers and PC enthusiasts seeking reliable and stylish memory.

cooling.name: Be Quiet! Dark Rock Pro 5
cooling.description: Flagship dual-tower CPU cooler designed for maximum performance and silent operation. Features dual Silent Wings fans, advanced noise dampening, and seven heat pipes for extreme cooling capacity while maintaining virtually silent operation at just 23.3 dB(A).
cooling.in_the_box: Cooler, 2 x 120mm fans, Thermal Grease, Mounting Set, Screwdriver, User Manual

cooling.name: Be Quiet! Dark Rock 5
cooling.description: Premium, high-performance air cooler with extremely silent operation. Features a single tower design with six heat pipes, black coating, and a Silent Wings 120mm PWM fan for excellent cooling of high-performance CPUs while maintaining virtually inaudible operation.
cooling.in_the_box: Cooler, Fan, Thermal Grease, Mounting Set, Screwdriver, User Manual

cooling.name: DeepCool AK620 ZERO DARK
cooling.description: High-end dual tower CPU cooler with six heatpipes and dual 120mm FDB fans, offering exceptional cooling performance for enthusiast and gaming builds. Compatible with both Intel and AMD platforms.

cooling.name: DeepCool LE520
cooling.description: Premium 240mm all-in-one liquid CPU cooler with ARGB lighting, dual 120mm Hydro fans, and an illuminated pump head. Offers superior cooling performance for high-end CPUs with support for Intel and AMD sockets.

cooling.name: DeepCool AK400 DIGITAL
cooling.description: RGB illuminated CPU cooler with LCD display temperature monitor, 120mm fluid dynamic bearing fan, and 220W TDP cooling capacity. Compatible with Intel LGA1700/1200/1151/1150/1155 and AMD AM5/AM4 sockets.

cooling.name: DeepCool AK400 ZERO DARK
cooling.description: High-performance CPU cooler with a 120mm fluid dynamic bearing fan, offering 220W TDP cooling capacity. Compatible with Intel LGA1700/1200/1151/1150/1155 and AMD AM5/AM4 sockets.

cooling.name: Be Quiet! Pure Rock 2 Black
cooling.description: Silent and efficient CPU air cooler with a 120mm Pure Wings 2 fan, featuring pure aluminum heatsink and copper heat pipes. Compatible with Intel and AMD sockets offering 150W TDP cooling capacity.
cooling.in_the_box: Cooler with pre-applied Thermal Grease, Pure Wings 2 PWM Fan, Mounting Kit

os.name: Windows 11 Pro
os.description: Windows 11 Pro is the ultimate operating system for professional PC builders and power users. Packed with advanced features, it offers robust security measures, including BitLocker encryption and Windows Hello biometric authentication, to protect sensitive data. With enhanced productivity tools such as Microsoft Teams integration and seamless virtualization support, Windows 11 Pro empowers users to maximize their efficiency and take their projects to the next level.

os.name: Windows 11 Home
os.description: Windows 11 Home is the latest operating system from Microsoft, designed to bring a fresh and intuitive experience to your PC. With its sleek and modern interface, users can enjoy a seamless multitasking environment, enhanced productivity features, and improved gaming capabilities. Packed with innovative updates, including a centralized Start menu, virtual desktops, and a new Microsoft Store, Windows 11 Home is the perfect choice for PC builders seeking a user-friendly and powerful operating system.

os.name: No Windows
os.description: With this option, you are responsible for understanding the process for installing Windows or your chosen operating system, as well as sourcing your own license, and configuring the BIOS correctly - our support team will not be able to assist with an operating system installation. For ease and to guarantee the best possible performance from your new PC, we recommend you choose to have Windows 11 supplied and preinstalled by our experienced engineers.
